attributes.action: Outlaw social networking sites to assist the fight against crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government and police should be are aware that youths use sites such as Facebook and MySpace to organise events and to meet up. It is likely that such organisation could lead to the commiting of criminal acts. 

To prevent this, the Government should ban the access of these sites from the UK to assist the fight against crime.
